0.1.name: wordpress/aparat-shortcode
0.1.description:
AparatVideoShortcode allows you to easily post Aparat.com video to your site with [aparat] shortcode.

Plugin Usage

Just wrap your Aparat video link in [aparat] or paste and select Aparat video link and then press "Aparat Video Shortcode" button. simple example: [aparat]http://www.aparat.com/v/f64a4690ab2d72f3d81b0c7423cc4a38140016[/aparat]

You can define video width and height with 'width' and 'height' parameters. also you can define ability of fullscreen mode for videos with 'fullscreen' with boolean value. complex example: [aparat fullscreen="false" width="500" height="300"]http://www.aparat.com/v/f64a4690ab2d72f3d81b0c7423cc4a38140016[/aparat]

Send email for Translation files: alitopack[a]gmail[dot].com
